meanings.definition: A person who is between 60 and 69 years old.
meanings.sent1: The lively community center organized a dance for the sexagenarians in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor, a cheerful sexagenarian, enjoys gardening and taking walks in the park.
meanings.sent3: At the birthday party, the sexagenarian showed off some impressive dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The group of sexagenarians shared stories of their youth, reminiscing about the good old days.
meanings.sent5: The wise sexagenarian offered valuable advice to the younger generation, based on years of experience.

meanings.definition: Of the age of 60 to 69 years old.
meanings.sent1: The retirement community welcomed a new resident, a friendly sexagenarian gentleman.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended regular check-ups for his sexagenarian patients to monitor their health.
meanings.sent3: The tech-savvy sexagenarian surprised everyone with his knowledge of the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent4: The quaint town had charming streets lined with picturesque houses owned by sexagenarian couples.
meanings.sent5: The elegant ballroom hosted a dance for the sexagenarian guests, who glided gracefully across the floor.
